activities: Mapbox, Inc. is a mapping platform that enables developers to integrate location into any mobile or online application. Mapbox receives and processes personal information from users of its mapping services within the EU/EEA and Switzerland. Mapbox collects personal information from individuals in EU member states and Switzerland for purposes of providing and improving Mapbox services, payment processing and management, providing customer support, and sales and marketing. Mapbox also collects personal information from employees for human resources purposes and to comply with applicable laws.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline user and employee data, which may be manually processed
recoursemech: JAMS, EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
